tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: how could somebody not watched this movie...this﻿ is a fucking legend
your confused with nationality and ethnicity.﻿
isnt salma middle eastern and﻿ mexican?
idk what you mean? her nationality is mexican and her ethnicity is middle eastern and spanish descent or indigenous or﻿ both... idk her mom lol
i just find him soooo sexy. love this song too﻿
Desperado!﻿ Viva La vida!!!!!!!!!!!!
Desperado.﻿
[iminent=JEMNzlR59l2] _____________ I have just posted﻿ a cool Emoticon!
VIVA﻿ MEXICO CABRONES
How ?﻿

Me gusta tocar guitarra, Me gusta cantar el son, Mi mariachi me acompaa, Cuando toco mi cancion. Me gusta tomar mis copas, Aguardiente es lo mejor, Tambien el tekila blanco con su﻿ sal le da sabor. Ay ay ay ay, Ay ay mi amor, Ay mi morena De mi corazon.
you got a point but the movie is all about a mexican mariachi? Have you seen the movie? :D﻿ Just kiddn
nice﻿
Banderas is an﻿ absolutely beautiful man

te recomendaria de escuchar varios musicos que tocan en este mismo estilo algo menos comercial de lo que﻿ te muestra﻿ tu tele pero mejor te dejo con tus ideas y tu estilo criollo que solo tu conoces y pues asi dejandote algundia comprobaras que tu comentario es erroneo jejje relax coco ha por cierto arriba Mexico y su gran bolero que hasta premian internacionalmente jejje bye =)
405 people have been put 6 feet under the ground by the Mariachi﻿ !!!

This is my song when i walk at midnight down the streets with my black suit and hands in the pockets with a cigarette in my mouth.﻿
Greetings from Germany / Stuttgart!
Love it! Me gusta :)
Desperadoooo...ohhh crap﻿ its awesome
What's﻿ this movie called ?!?!?
desperado﻿
This should be the﻿ official mexican national anthem lol
Salma Hayek =﻿ 50% Spanish - 50% Lebanese Other than that, i completely agree with﻿ you.
muy bella cancion....!!! ﻿
